content: "Bright Star" is a sonnet, and specifically, it's a form of sonnet called "Shakespearean sonnet" which consist of 14 lines, and follows a specific rhyme scheme. The rhyme scheme of a Shakespearean sonnet is abab cdcd efef gg. Each quatrain (four-line stanza) follows the pattern of the rhyme scheme and the final couplet (two-line stanza) usually brings the poem to a conclusion or gives a final thought.
